attributes.action: Exclude existing skilled workers from new immigration proposal
attributes.additional_details: Most of the skilled workers migrated to the UK with a hope of settlement after working and paying taxes for 5 years.
attributes.background: Those who are already in the UK on skilled workers visa should not be included in the new rules outlined in white paper released on May 12, 2025

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
